body_html:
Could you clarify what you mean "if your input is already in the right format"? I would be very happy to write a passing test case that does not use any of the optional methods if you show me the way.

I've tried making a new np.array containing a list (but not list of lists) and that fails.
I've tried passing a list and that fails (no dtype).
